title: 7.14 Replays
body:
Since the update this morning, none of my replays of the new version can be viewed. It says "This Replay has expired" even though it's from this version. Does anyone know why this is happening?
(I would show a screenshot but I don't know how to upload it)

replies.body: Sorry to be the messenger of bad news here, but replays only last for the duration of the patch it was made on.  :(  It's super important to make highlights of the replays you want to keep, because they won't be available for the next patch.  More info can also be found in our[ Replays FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips).  Sorry about that.  :(
I have the same problem i cant download/watch a fresh patch replays, but replays from 7.13 are still available
